title: Posted in multiple sections because good golly I have a bundle to offer
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Posted in multiple sections because good golly I have a bundle to offer
posts.post_content:
Posted By: brian p
Over Eighty new cards listed, and expanded wantlist as well!    

Below are the cards I have available for trade for cards on my wantlist that follows directly after. The cards range from Poor to VG, with most falling in the Fair to G-Vg range. The non-Zeenut cards that are in Good up to Vg condition I have listed with an + symbol after the player's name. If a card has a nice overall front appearance, but has some sort of fatal flaw (minor trimming, punch holes, writing on front/back, heavy back damage, etc.) I indicated with an * after the player's name. The vast majority of the lower grade cards are not completely beat-up...only a few are on life-support. 

I am only interested in trades, and will respond to emails in the order that they are received. My computer time can be very limited, so may take a day or a week or so to get back to you. Pretend it is like the olden days when everyone had to correspond via US mail. Scans are available...see note above about how long it might take. 

I am willing to consider any condition for the cards on my wantlist.

Brian
